## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have removed any console.log or debugging statements

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README, docs/, etc.)
- [ ] I have updated code comments and docstrings
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated examples if needed

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] I have tested edge cases
- [ ] I have tested error handling

### Git

- [ ] My commits follow the Conventional Commits format
- [ ] My branch is up to date with the main branch
- [ ] I have squashed unnecessary commits
